201702.n: Comparative Party Systems and Electral Behaviour

201801.n: Comparative Party Systems and Electral Behaviour

202001.n: Comparative Party Systems and Electral Behaviour

catList: This course is designed to provide a review of historical and conceptual bases of modern party systems, mass electoral behaviour and election systems. Competing theoretical paradigms that adress the enduring issues in the literature are introduced, application of the basic tools of analysis in the literature are presented and comparable research questions for the Turkish context are discussed.
